body.name: JIUYOTREE Portable Bookshelf, 9 Cube Closet Storage Organizer Bookcase,Clothes Storage for Living Room,Study Room,Bedroom, Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 37 mins
features: 【HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS】--The bookshelf is composed of high-quality metal tube, PP plastic joint and non-woven fabric.The metal pipe not only has strong bearing capacity, but also won't rust.The PP plastic joint is made of high-quality plastic and connected firmly.The non-woven fabric is waterproof, it has strong load-bearing capacity and has no irritating odor that damages the human body, and it is environmentally friendly and healthy.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL SHELF】-- This is a multifunctional shelf, you can use it to store books, bags, toys, towels, small vases, artworks, folders, clothes and shoes.It can play its powerful storage function, whether it is in the living room, bedroom, study, corridor or aisle.

【LARGE CAPACITY, STRONG LOAD-BEARING】-- It has 9 grids, the size of each grid is 15.75 x 11.81＂/ 40 x 30cm. It has a great storage capacity to store your belongings.The shelf has a strong load-bearing capacity because each layer is supported by four steel pipes.
【PRODUCT SIZE】-- The size of the bookshelf is 49.21 x 11.81 x 48.82 " / 125 x 30x 124cm.It only occupies a small part of your room, but it can store a lot of your sundries and make your room orderly.
【EASY TO INSTALL】-- You can easily install this bookshelf without any additional tools.You just need to follow the instructions carefully to install it step by step, it will bring you the fun of DIY.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Specifications Size 49.21 x 11.81 x 48.82 " / 125 x 30x 124cm Weight 5.73 LBS/ 2.6 kg Colour Grey Material Steel, PP Plastic Connector and Waterproof Non-woven Fabric Number of Cubes 9 Load Capacity of Each Cube 10 LBS

Function description: If you or your child have a lot of books and don’t know where to put them, then this bookshelf can help you.You can stack the books neatly and place them in different grids of the bookshelf. You can also sort the books according to different grids so that you can find them next time. If you use this shelf in the bedroom, it can act as your wardrobe and help you organize your clothes. If you put the shelf in the children’s entertainment room, it can store the children’s toys that are piled up everywhere. Considering that the non-woven fabric of the shelf is waterproof, you can also use this shelf in the bathroom to store your towels, slippers, shampoo, shower gel, etc. Installation Notes: 1.Please separate steel pipes of different lengths and separate different types of interfaces before installation. 2.Please pay attention to the orientation of the PP interface when installing. 3.Please make sure to cover the pipe with non-woven fabric before installing the horizontal compartments. 4.Ensure that each pipe and each PP interface are installed firmly and tightly. Attention: Don't let children play with the accessories of goods, so as not to hurt themselves. Please be careful not to get cut by the metal edge when you install this shelf.

You can use it in the children’s entertainment room, it can store the children’s toys which are piled up everywhere. You can also use it in the bedroom, it can act as your wardrobe and help you organize your clothes. You can use it in the study room, it allows your books to be neatly arranged in each cube.You can also sort the books according to different cubes so that you can find them easily next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy and fast to put together and, I believe, looks very nice. It is sturdy, but not that sturdy. Do not put too much weight on the shelf or it might collapse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect it to be spectacular for the price, but this is awful. Fabric is cheap. The bars don't even go in the plastic holes properly. Most of them don't fit at all. And when they do, they just come right back out. So frustrating. This should've gone together rather quickly. Instead it's taken almost two hours and still not staying together. Rip off. Should've paid a bit extra for something better. Very disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't order cheap and expect quality
reviews.reviewText: Cheap piece of junk, but what did I expect for $26.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's nice and durable
reviews.reviewText: Throw small in what I thought but it's very nice for what I'm going to use it for I'm definitely going to buy another one to add to it since it's small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Annoying to Setup but not difficult.
reviews.reviewText: It came all apart and I had to assemble literally everything but it wasn’t hard to do and came with instructions. Takes about 20 mins to finish up if you’re doing it alone. Otherwise I love it, doesn’t look too cheap and can withstand the weight of my plants on top! It’s very lightweight so building it in a more open space then moving to where you want it to be is really easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This portable bookcase is awesome. I love it . Is perfect for books and other items . Will buy another for my bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Do not order thus
reviews.reviewText: This thing is so flimsy and took hours to put together. The rods will not stay in place and when you fix one, another comes apart. It came apart after two weeks of having it set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with how they turned out!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these for my kids rooms to reorganize toys and when I opened the box I won't lie I was a little disappointed with the material but once I got it all set up and everything in place I was very happy with how they turned out. Super easy to put together also!

la descripción del producto es completamente acertada así que se merece las 5 estrellas sin embargo me gustaría añadir algunos detalles:Sí es muy fácil de armar pero necesitas cierto grado de fuerza para hacerlo, si no embonas bien TODOS los tubos va a estar bailando y para que embone bien se tiene que presionar fuerteLa "tela no tejida impermeable" es el material con el que se hacen las bolsas "ecológicas" de super pero con la capa extra del impermeabilizante y no creo que dure mucho pero igual es remplazableEsto viene en la hoja de instrucciones pero esta en ingles así que repito aquí: los extremos de los tubos no tienen ningún terminada así que hay que tener cuidado para no cortarse. Por eso se agradece el par de guantes tejidos que viene dentro de la caja, sí protegen de los accidentes menores que podrían suceder durante el ensambladoFinalmente , y esto es algo que tal vez solo a dos personas le interese, las piezas de plástico incluidas en el empaque están pensadas para ensamblar la estantería solamente como aparece en la foto: el estante superior tal vez se pueda mover a la columna central si se prefiere pero no se puede poner en el lugar disponible en la fila de abajo para formar un estante de 3x3

J'avoue que ce n'est pas ce a quoi je m'attendais. Fais très bien l'affaire mais n'a pas été facile à monter. J'ai cassé une des branches en essayant de l'ajuster. Il ne faut pas se tromper en l'installant . Les cloisons ne remplissent pas toute l'espace entre les branches mais est très solide. Plus grand que je le croyais aussi. Il n'y a pas 36 manières de le mettre à cause de la forme des pièces. Mais mes choses sont rangées et il y a assez d'espace pour des paniers et des choses volumineuses alors je suis satisfaite !!

J'en ai acheté 3 pour faire un mur de séparation avec rangement... C'est super et ça se tient bien... Un peu ch*ant à assembler, mais quand tu en as 3 j'imagine que c'est normal.Simple et efficace, j'apprécie beaucoup.

The media could not be loaded. Everything is rods and fabric sheets and plastic connector. So many pieces, almost like an ikea assemble but no confusing instructions cause it’s pretty straight forward.
